page.title: 05Education in Ponthenry.
page.content: Ponthenry School is a designated county primary with 59 children on roll,3 teachers,2 kitchen employees,2 dinner supervisors and cleaner in charge.The medium of instruction is Welsh in the infants' department and bilingual in the juniors'.91.5% of the children are fluent Welsh speakers. There are 3 classes:Infants-30 children,Standards 1 and 2-13 children ,Standards 3 and 4-16 children. Children are admitted at the beginning of the term following their fourth birthday and are transferred to the Secondary Schools at the age of eleven. There are 2 buildings on the school campus with 4 classrooms,library, Headmaster's office,School Hall and kitchen with storage rooms.
